overview: With over 21 years of experience in the high tech industry, 16 of them managing large sale processes and teams for companies such as Scitex, Comverse & Amdocs, as well as start-up companies like Emblaze and Celltrex. He is an expert in Business Development with technology partners as well as distribution channels, new growth business engines (e.g. Mobile Money clearing house for Amdocs), penetration and development of new markets (e.g. China for Comverse), Defining new target verticals and achieving large yearly quota.
